name: Qeema Macaroni Recipe | Zarnak Sidhwa | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Qeema Macaroni Recipe: Elbow Macaroni 1 packet Recipe Mix 1 sachet Beef mince 2 cups Garlic paste 1 tbsp Ginger paste 1 tbsp Onion (chopped) 1 large Tomato (skinned & chopped) 1 cup Ginger (sliced) 2 tbsp Green chilies (sliced) 3 Fresh coriander (chopped) 2 tbsp Water 3 cups Oil Â½ cup
instructions: In pan heat oil, add chopped onions and fry till golden brown. Add a ginger garlic paste and fry for a minute. Add minced beef and fry for 2 minutes. Add recipe mix sachet and fry for a minute. Add chopped tomatoes and 3 cups of water; cook on low heat for 15 minutes. Reduce the liquid, add sliced ginger, sliced green chilies and chopped coriander; mix and serve with elbow macaroni.
